sect1.title: germanlig2ascii ()
sect1.para: This function translates German special characters (ä, ö and ü) to their ASCII equivalents (ae, oe and ue).

sect1.title: htmllig2latin ()
sect1.para: Does the same like germanlig2ascii () but translates HTML ligatures.

sect1.title: strhead ()
sect1.para: Checks if $haystack starts with $needle and returns 'true' if so.
